subject: Create a dynamic suite of tests
msgSnippet: Ok , i hope someone can help me out it s possible to create a  dynamic suite of tests using JUnit ex: start test Test 1 If faillure or error found - run Test 1
messageBody:
Ok , i hope someone can help me out

it's possible to create a dynamic suite of tests using JUnit

ex:
start test
Test 1
If faillure or error found - run Test 1
Test 2
If faillure or error found - run Test 1
Test 3
...
generate a rapport


i tried to use a testlistener, but i really dont know if its the
right thing to use, any exemple??

thanks
